import React, { Component } from 'react' import Ecom from '../Ecom.js' export default class Register extends Component { handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); var frm = new FormData(document.getElementById('loginForm')); const req = await fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/auth/login', { "method": "POST", "body": frm }) let res = await req.json(); Ecom.setCookie('session-member-record', JSON.stringify(res), 10); var data = JSON.parse(Ecom.getCookie('session-member-record')); console.log(data); window.location.href ="/home"; } render() { return ( <>
eCom
Create account

) } }
